div.pre: 143 Aegina, 1888 (19) Burial: after c. 287 B.C. (Newell) Contents: 3 AV, 13 AR, 3 AE Alexander III: 3 early post. st. (Greece ? Lampsacus, Citium) 1 tetradr. (very worn) Demetrius Poliorcetes: 1 tetradr. Athens: 11 tetradr.; 3 AE Disposition: Athens Svoronos, Ath√®nes, pl. 32, 8-14 (Athens) Newell, Demetrius, p. 134, note 5
